languages.text: "Постой, элантах. Врата {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g} поют мне — я чувствую, как мы приближаемся к нашему спасению, что сокрыто за этими дверями. Однако провидцы с моего мира все еще где-то там, в недрах шпиля. Я не могу их бросить".

traits.locale_text: "Постой, элантах. Врата {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g} поют мне — я чувствую, как мы приближаемся к нашему спасению, что сокрыто за этими дверями. Однако провидцы с моего мира все еще где-то там, в недрах шпиля. Я не могу их бросить".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wait, elantach. The {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate is singing to me. I sense that we are drawing closer to our salvation, which is concealed behind these doors. However, the Farseers from my world are still in there, somewhere in the depths of the spire. I cannot abandon them."
languages.original_text: "Постой, элантах. Врата {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Паутины{/g} поют мне — я чувствую, как мы приближаемся к нашему спасению, что сокрыто за этими дверями. Однако провидцы с моего мира все еще где-то там, в недрах шпиля. Я не могу их бросить".

However, the Farseers from my world are still in there, somewhere in the depths of the spire. I cannot abandon them."

traits.locale_text: "Wait, elantach. The {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate is singing to me. I sense that we are drawing closer to our salvation, which is concealed behind these doors. However, the Farseers from my world are still in there, somewhere in the depths of the spire. I cannot abandon them."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Espera, elantach. El portal de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g} me está cantando. Percibo que nos acercamos a la salvación, que se oculta tras estas puertas. Pero los videntes de mi mundo siguen ahí dentro, en algún lugar de esa torre. No puedo abandonarlos».
languages.original_text: "Wait, elantach. The {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate is singing to me. I sense that we are drawing closer to our salvation, which is concealed behind these doors. However, the Farseers from my world are still in there, somewhere in the depths of the spire. I cannot abandon them."

traits.locale_text: «Espera, elantach. El portal de la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Telaraña{/g} me está cantando. Percibo que nos acercamos a la salvación, que se oculta tras estas puertas. Pero los videntes de mi mundo siguen ahí dentro, en algún lugar de esa torre. No puedo abandonarlos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「待ってくれ、エランタ。{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}門が我に歌っている。この扉の向こうに隠された救済に我々が近づいているのを感じるのだ。だが我が惑星から来た先見司たちがまだ、尖塔の奥深くのどこかにいる。彼らを見捨てることはできない」
languages.original_text: "Wait, elantach. The {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate is singing to me. I sense that we are drawing closer to our salvation, which is concealed behind these doors. However, the Farseers from my world are still in there, somewhere in the depths of the spire. I cannot abandon them."

traits.locale_text: 「待ってくれ、エランタ。{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}網辻{/g}門が我に歌っている。この扉の向こうに隠された救済に我々が近づいているのを感じるのだ。だが我が惑星から来た先見司たちがまだ、尖塔の奥深くのどこかにいる。彼らを見捨てることはできない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “等等，外界人，{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}大门正在向我歌唱。我能感觉到我们的救赎越来越近了，它就隐藏在这扇门后面。然而，我的先知族人依然留在尖塔深处的某个地方，我不能就这么抛弃他们。”
languages.original_text: "Wait, elantach. The {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate is singing to me. I sense that we are drawing closer to our salvation, which is concealed behind these doors. However, the Farseers from my world are still in there, somewhere in the depths of the spire. I cannot abandon them."

traits.locale_text: “等等，外界人，{g|Encyclopedia:Webway}网道{/g}大门正在向我歌唱。我能感觉到我们的救赎越来越近了，它就隐藏在这扇门后面。然而，我的先知族人依然留在尖塔深处的某个地方，我不能就这么抛弃他们。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Attendez, elantach. Le portail sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g} me chante à l'oreille. Je sens que nous approchons de notre salut, qui se trouve derrière ces portes. Les Grands Prophètes de mon monde, cependant, sont encore ici, quelque part dans les profondeurs de la tour. Je ne peux pas les abandonner. »
languages.original_text: "Wait, elantach. The {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate is singing to me. I sense that we are drawing closer to our salvation, which is concealed behind these doors. However, the Farseers from my world are still in there, somewhere in the depths of the spire. I cannot abandon them."

traits.locale_text: « Attendez, elantach. Le portail sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Toile{/g} me chante à l'oreille. Je sens que nous approchons de notre salut, qui se trouve derrière ces portes. Les Grands Prophètes de mon monde, cependant, sont encore ici, quelque part dans les profondeurs de la tour. Je ne peux pas les abandonner. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wartet, Elantach. Das Tor zum {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netz der Tausend Tore{/g} singt zu mir. Ich spüre, dass wir uns unserer Erlösung nähern, sie befindet sich hinter diesen Türen. Aber die Runenpropheten von meiner Welt sind immer noch dort, irgendwo in den Tiefen des Turms. Ich kann sie nicht zurücklassen."
languages.original_text: "Wait, elantach. The {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate is singing to me. I sense that we are drawing closer to our salvation, which is concealed behind these doors. However, the Farseers from my world are still in there, somewhere in the depths of the spire. I cannot abandon them."

traits.locale_text: "Wartet, Elantach. Das Tor zum {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Netz der Tausend Tore{/g} singt zu mir. Ich spüre, dass wir uns unserer Erlösung nähern, sie befindet sich hinter diesen Türen. Aber die Runenpropheten von meiner Welt sind immer noch dort, irgendwo in den Tiefen des Turms. Ich kann sie nicht zurücklassen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, bekle. {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol{/g} Geçidi, bana şarkı söylüyor. Şu kapıların ardında kilitli kurtuluşumuza gitgide yaklaştığımızı seziyorum. Fakat benim dünyamdan gelen Ötesezenler hâlâ orada, kulenin derinliklerinde bir yerdeler. Onları geride bırakamam."
languages.original_text: "Wait, elantach. The {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Webway{/g} Gate is singing to me. I sense that we are drawing closer to our salvation, which is concealed behind these doors. However, the Farseers from my world are still in there, somewhere in the depths of the spire. I cannot abandon them."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, bekle. {g|Encyclopedia:Webway}Ağyol{/g} Geçidi, bana şarkılar söylüyor. Şu kapıların ardında kilitli kalmış kurtuluşumuza gittikçe yaklaştığımızı seziyorum. Fakat benim dünyamdan gelen Ötesezenler hâlâ orada, kulenin derinlerinde bir yerdeler. Onları geride bırakamam."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
